statements: SELECT * FROM MarketingData;
SELECT marketing_id, offline_sales FROM MarketingData WHERE online_sales > 1000;
SELECT offline_sales, online_sales FROM MarketingData WHERE offline_sales < 500;
SELECT online_sales, marketing_id FROM MarketingData WHERE online_sales < offline_sales;
SELECT online_sales, offline_sales FROM MarketingData ORDER BY offline_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingData WHERE offline_sales > 1000 AND online_sales < 500
SELECT marketing_id, offline_sales FROM MarketingData WHERE marketing_id = 10
SELECT online_sales, offline_sales FROM MarketingData WHERE marketing_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM MarketingData ORDER BY offline_sales DESC, online_sales ASC
SELECT AVG(offline_sales) AS avg_offline_sales, AVG(online_sales) AS avg_online_sales FROM MarketingData
SELECT * FROM offline_sales_data;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM offline_sales_data WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM offline_sales_data;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM offline_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM offline_sales_data ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM offline_sales_data WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) FROM offline_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY SUM(transaction_amount) DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(transaction_amount) FROM offline_sales_data GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM online_sales_data WHERE order_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(order_amount) FROM online_sales_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(order_amount) > 200
SELECT * FROM OfflineSalesData;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM OnlineSalesData WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM MarketingCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM OfflineSalesData WHERE customer_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM OnlineSalesData ORDER BY amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM OfflineSalesData ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) as total_sales FROM OnlineSalesData GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_sales > 1000
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) as avg_amount FROM OnlineSalesData GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM OfflineSalesData WHERE amount > 5000 AND transaction_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) as campaign_duration FROM MarketingCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_duration DESC
SELECT * FROM online_sales;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM offline_sales ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM offline_sales WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT performance_id, order_id, invoice_id, campaign_id, revenue FROM sales_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM offline_sales WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, marketing_channel FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT performance_id, order_id, invoice_id, campaign_id, revenue FROM sales_performance ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM online_sales JOIN offline_sales ON online_sales.customer_id = offline_sales.customer_id WHERE online_sales.total_amount > offline_sales.total_amount;
SELECT * FROM offline_sales;
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_amount FROM online_sales WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM offline_sales_report WHERE total_sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_date, total_sales_amount FROM online_sales_report ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM offline_sales;
SELECT customer_id, quantity, total_amount FROM online_sales ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, quantity FROM offline_sales WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM offline_sales_report WHERE total_sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_sales_amount DESC;
